00036 #include <sys/socket.h>
00037 
00038 #define PSI_IDLE    0
00039 #define PSI_START   1
00040 #define PSI_RUNNING 2
00041 #define PSI_STOP    3
00042 
00043 typedef struct {
00044     u_char psi_status;
00045     HANDLE psi_cmdevt;
00046     HANDLE psi_stsevt;
00048     u_long psi_metaint;
00050     u_long psi_mp3left;
00051     u_long psi_start;
00052     u_char psi_metaupdate;
00053     char  *psi_metatitle;
00054     char  *psi_metaurl;
00055     TCPSOCKET *psi_sock;
00056 } PLAYERINFO;
00057 
00058 extern PLAYERINFO player;
00059 
00060 extern int PlayerInit(void);
00061 extern int PlayerStop(u_long tmo);
00062 extern int PlayerStart(TCPSOCKET * sock, u_long metaint, u_long tmo);
